# ChangeLog
## 5.0.0
* eBay Merchant services: Partitioned attribute to DS2 cookie, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-5962

## 4.8.9
* Remove cookies-dev as it is no longer used

## 4.8.8 
* Mark Old Cookie as Warning in cookies-ebay, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-5603

## 4.8.7 
* cookies-ebay dependency not declared, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-5595

## 4.8.6
* Added logs to display cookiename for 404 seskeyId not found

## 4.8.5
* fix: COOKIE_BIT lookup by id not available to look name by cookiebitid

## 4.8.4
* add typescript support for COOKIE_BIT lookup by id

## 4.8.3
* COOKIE_BIT lookup by id not available,  https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-5309

## 4.8.2
* Fixed app specific override for Secure Cookie configuration

## 4.8.1
* Create a app specific override for Secure Cookie configuration, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-4723

## v4.8.0
* Added Typescript support for cookies-ebay module, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3691

## v4.7.0
* Scope maintenance work
* Removed dead code including non-scoped modules used ther
* Updated test cases after the change from cookies-resources-ebay@0.1.28 to 0.2.0 (NON_PII removed)

## v4.6.0
* Moved app-token to service-instruments-ebay, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3396

## v4.5.4
* Fix: Hijacking guest account by tampering s cookie with ACCOUNT_ID, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/REGSTRN-13167

## v4,5.3 - republishing of v4.5.2
Fix: sessionkey service token expire error, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3406
Fix: cookies-ebay session keys service has circular dependency on cookies via guid
Upgrade to @ebay/iaf-ebay@4.1.4 which fixes issue in v4.5.2

## v4.5.2 - reverted
* Fix: sessionkey service token expire error, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3406

## v4.5.1
* Rolled back changes related to v4.4.0 required by https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3281 due to token expiration issues

## v4.5.0 - reverted
* Do not allow cookies not managed by metadata to be sent to browsers, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3385

## v4.4.0 - reverted
* Switched to oauth token protected route for session key operations: https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3281

## v4.3.8
* Added: deprecation message, phase I (out of two phases), https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3079

## v4.3.7
* Fix: ns1 empty value prevents updating the cookie, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3333

## v4.3.6
* Change CAL error log for blacklisted cookies to CAL events

## v4.3.5
* Enable HttpOnly flag for eBay cookies, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2458

## v4.3.4
* Fix: parsing browser cookies should be marked as warnings for blacklisted ones, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3156

## v4.3.3
* Fix: NPE for blacklisted cookies in unit tests, part of https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3136

## v4.3.1
* Fix: Changing refresh interval on cookies-ebay config does not take effect, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2848

## v4.3.0
* Added: Support for SameSite Cookie Attribute
https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2733

## v4.2.0
* Added: Enable secure attribute for all eBay cookies, phase 2, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2732

## v4.1.5
* Switch from short vip to long vip

## v4.1.4
* NODE-2615 - Cookie Audit Instrumentation for VI, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2615

## v4.1.3
* Add cookie and cookielet audit instrumentation, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2513

## v4.1.2
* Fixed false error message due to early access of the cookielets
* Corrected cal logging that led to hiding error message when error object is of Error type

## v4.1.1
* Corrected a bug related to startup cycle for cookies authz updates

## v4.1.0
* Feature: Delete unused eBay Cookies, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2547
* Feature: Implement Secure Cookies Feature Enable/Disable via Authzsvc, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2512

## v4.0.14
* Fix: disable secure cookie attribute by default and allow config bean to changes it, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2454

## v4.0.11
* Removed explicitly defined discovery instrument

## v4.0.10
* Added urn for service-discovery

## v4.0.9
* Fix: cookielet metadata autorefresh should be generated as true when the corresponding attribute is missing in metadata, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2008

## v4.0.6
* Fix: NODE-1388: Try inserting HMAC secret if find by ID returns 404

## v4.0.5
* cookies-ebay should prevent invalid cookies committed from directly into res.headers, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-1262

## v4.0.4
* Fixed issue that changes expiration behavior for cookielets per https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-1194
* Changed the location of cookies metadata source to githubv4 from github

## v4.0.1
* Updated location of metadata to the latest location in postinstall script.

## v4.0.0
* Remove peer and unwanted dependencies and upgrade dependencies

## v0.2.32
* Enhancement: Set _fsom cookie when redirect query param is set to mobile

## v0.2.31
* Fixed: NPE in req.ebay.cookies.removeCookie and error when setting cookie using express' res.cookie

## v0.2.30
* Fixed: cannot get/set cookies not defined in cookie meta-data.

## v0.2.29
* Fixed: Should not delete cookielets immediately. They should be marked down as deleted instead and cleanup during cookie commit phase. This will allow other to read them if they need to. This will address issue found in tracking: https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-273

## v0.2.28
* Fixed: cannot set session bit flag from empty state: https://github.corp.ebay.com/nodejs/cookies-ebay/issues/16

## v0.2.27
* Removed unused dependencies

## v0.2.26
* Performance optimizations.

## v0.2.25
* Removed request-local dependency

## v0.2.24
* Updated: cookies-meta to cookies-resources for auto publishing metadata

## v0.2.23
* Added: postinstall file to auto publish metadata

## v0.2.22
* Added setFlag support for flag bits
* Fixed: hasFlag logic

## v0.2.19
* Converted to service-client-ebay to provide configbean/mardown and up/cal/tracking/etc.

## v0.2.18
* Updated expired endpoints for QA/DEV/LNP environments.

## v0.2.17
* Fixed: POLYGLOT-1258 - cookies parsing fails when cookies are messed up by proxies
* Fixed: POLYGLOT-1257 - sequential cookie commits overwrite previously set values

## v0.2.16
* Updated `npm registry` from `npm.paypal.com` to `npm.corp.ebay.com`
